column4: Unit Size：W305×D385×H45mm；Actual Power：1950W；Supply Voltage：220-240V~50/60Hz；Control：Touch keys，6 keys，1×four-digit segment display，slider control for power；Glass size：290×370mm（artwork can be customized）；Timer：Yes；Display Power&Temperature level：8；Length of Power Cord：1.2mtr；Packaging accessories：User manual，PE bag，inner tray，gift box，carton；Net weight：2.4KG；Container information：1pcs/gift box，6pcs/carton
